name: Pregnant Mother Life Mom Games
summary: Welcome to a complete life story of John and Alice as they start their life and are blessed with kids in Mother Games. Enjoy the life simulator and perform different day to day tasks and live the life of allice and john. Do grocery, cleaning, online shopping, get ready for your husband and enjoy the beautiful life in this family simulator. Take care of kids and your health, visit doctors by driving your own car and enjoy every aspect of life.
